newsitem.title: SPAIN: Basque youths arrested after Spanish riot.
newsitem.headline: Basque youths arrested after Spanish riot.

text.p: Four young people have been arrested for taking part in disturbances across the Basque region, Spanish police said on Saturday.
Police said four banks, a car and other property were attacked on Friday after a youth section of Herri Batasuna, the political wing of Basque separatist group ETA, called a day of action.
The action was called in protest at the arrest last Thursday of some 18 youths accused of belonging to youth support groups linked to ETA (Basque Homeland and Freedom).
